SELECT SI_ALLOWANCE.SI_ALLOWANCE_ID , SI_ALLOWANCE.MS_SI_ALLOWANCE_ID , SI_ALLOWANCE.MS_VESSEL_ID , SI_ALLOWANCE.CAPTAIN_SENIN_ID , SI_ALLOWANCE.YEAR_MONTH , SI_ALLOWANCE.CONTENTS , SI_ALLOWANCE.QUANTITY , SI_ALLOWANCE.ALLOWANCE , SI_ALLOWANCE.PERSON_IN_CHARGE , SI_ALLOWANCE.DELETE_FLAG , SI_ALLOWANCE.SEND_FLAG , SI_ALLOWANCE.VESSEL_ID , SI_ALLOWANCE.DATA_NO , SI_ALLOWANCE.USER_KEY , SI_ALLOWANCE.RENEW_DATE , SI_ALLOWANCE.RENEW_USER_ID , SI_ALLOWANCE.TS
FROM SI_ALLOWANCE
INNER JOIN MS_SI_ALLOWANCE on MS_SI_ALLOWANCE.MS_SI_ALLOWANCE_ID = SI_ALLOWANCE.MS_SI_ALLOWANCE_ID INNER JOIN MS_VESSEL on MS_VESSEL.MS_VESSEL_ID = SI_ALLOWANCE.MS_VESSEL_ID
WHERE SI_ALLOWANCE.DELETE_FLAG = 0

INSERT INTO SI_ALLOWANCE( SI_ALLOWANCE_ID , MS_SI_ALLOWANCE_ID , MS_VESSEL_ID , CAPTAIN_SENIN_ID , YEAR_MONTH , CONTENTS , QUANTITY , ALLOWANCE , PERSON_IN_CHARGE , DELETE_FLAG , SEND_FLAG , VESSEL_ID , DATA_NO , USER_KEY , RENEW_DATE , RENEW_USER_ID , TS ) VALUES( :SI_ALLOWANCE_ID , :MS_SI_ALLOWANCE_ID , :MS_VESSEL_ID , :CAPTAIN_SENIN_ID , :YEAR_MONTH , :CONTENTS , :QUANTITY , :ALLOWANCE , :PERSON_IN_CHARGE , :DELETE_FLAG , :SEND_FLAG , :VESSEL_ID , :DATA_NO , :USER_KEY , :RENEW_DATE , :RENEW_USER_ID , :TS )

UPDATE SI_ALLOWANCE SET MS_SI_ALLOWANCE_ID = :MS_SI_ALLOWANCE_ID , MS_VESSEL_ID = :MS_VESSEL_ID , CAPTAIN_SENIN_ID = :CAPTAIN_SENIN_ID , YEAR_MONTH = :YEAR_MONTH , CONTENTS = :CONTENTS , QUANTITY = :QUANTITY , ALLOWANCE = :ALLOWANCE , PERSON_IN_CHARGE = :PERSON_IN_CHARGE , DELETE_FLAG = :DELETE_FLAG , SEND_FLAG = :SEND_FLAG , VESSEL_ID = :VESSEL_ID , DATA_NO = :DATA_NO , USER_KEY = :USER_KEY , RENEW_DATE = :RENEW_DATE , RENEW_USER_ID = :RENEW_USER_ID , TS = :TS WHERE SI_ALLOWANCE_ID = :SI_ALLOWANCE_ID
